mapper.select: select id, username, password, email, phone, team from vtauth.user where username =#{username};
select id, username, password, email, phone, team from vtauth.user;
mapper.update: update vtauth.user set username = #{username},password=#{password},email=#{email},phone=#{phone},team=#{team} where id=#{id}
